text:
@realDonaldTrump You cut CDC funding and fired the Pandemic Response Team 2 years ago and now you blame the previous administration for your chaotic response to COVID-19.

During H1N1 emergency was declared immediately, millions were tested and stock markets did not lose 20% of their value.
